title: A Great ship
creator_credit: Rayant Pictures, British Information Services, Anthony Gilkison and John Reeve
brief_description: P&O decided in 1955 to build the largest passenger liner since World War II, the Canberra. This documentary focuses on the construction of the vessel, followed by her maiden voyage.
creator_credit_for_label: Rayant Pictures, British Information Services, Anthony Gilkison and John Reeve
